content.verses:
[
    [0] {
      order: 1
      type: verse
      hawaiian_text: 
      | Aia i Mauna Kilohana
      | ʻO aʻu lehua ʻula i ka wao
      | Nā maka ʻohe kiʻi i ka wai
      | ʻĀhaʻi ka ʻiʻini a ka manaʻo
      english_text: Liliʻuokalani
      hawaiian_lines: [Aia i Mauna Kilohana, ʻO aʻu lehua ʻula i ka wao, Nā maka ʻohe kiʻi i ka wai, ʻĀhaʻi ka ʻiʻini a ka manaʻo]
      english_lines: [Liliʻuokalani]
    }
    [1] {
      order: 2
      type: hui
      hawaiian_text: 
      | By and by hoʻi mai ʻoe
      | E he ʻala hoene i ka poli
      | By and by hoʻi mai ʻoe
      | I ʻaneʻi kāua e laʻi ai
      | E ʻae ana paha
      | wau i ka ualo
      | I ka leo hea a ka pololei
      | E hoʻi aku nō wau e pili
      | Me ka ua Kīpuʻu o ka nahele
      | Me he ua noe ala ko aloha
      | E hana mau nei kuʻu nui kino
      | ʻO kou kai ia e mākoi ai
      | Uʻi ʻaʻā ia pua i ka nani
      english_text: Liliʻuokalani
      hawaiian_lines: [By and by hoʻi mai ʻoe, E he ʻala hoene i ka poli, By and by hoʻi mai ʻoe, I ʻaneʻi kāua e laʻi ai, E ʻae ana paha, wau i ka ualo, I ka leo hea a ka pololei, E hoʻi aku nō wau e pili, Me ka ua Kīpuʻu o ka nahele, Me he ua noe ala ko aloha, E hana mau nei kuʻu nui kino, ʻO kou kai ia e mākoi ai, Uʻi ʻaʻā ia pua i ka nani]
      english_lines: [Liliʻuokalani]
      label: Hui:
    }
  ]

metadata.source_publication: Recorded by Nā ʻŌiwi. Hawaiian Text edited by Puakea Nogelmeier
